posts.post_content: Please Kindly let me know if you have or know of a Grignon Cubs Hofman for sale. Thanks!
Hi Paul, I'm afraid that I'm looking for Hofman as well (and others). Do you have any duplicates that you want to trade?

Hi Sean, I only need Hofman to complete the set. I do have duplicates, but I'm going to hang on to them for possible trades for Hofman. Once I complete the set, I will Let you know what I have to sell or trade.
